title: "Machine learning uncovers missing info about ethnicity in population health data: Study"
excerpt: "Machine learning can be used to fill a significant gap in Canadian public health data related to ethnicity and Aboriginal status, according to research published in PLOS ONE by a University of Alberta research epidemiologist."
